startMessage: 🦄 Uniswap 🤖bot welcomes you!🌟 This bot will help you find out the current price of the token you are interested in on the 🦄 Uniswap cryptocurrency exchange. In order to get started, you just need to start entering the ticker of your 💰token and it will show you the price of the coin in 💵USDT. More detailed ℹ️information can be found on touch /help command . We hope that the bot will be useful for you)
helpMessage: How to use this bot? You just need to enter the token 💰ticker (lower case or upper case, no matter), the price of which you would like to know in the 💵USDT and bot will give you this price. If you enter an incorrect ticker, the bot will inform you about this and you will need to enter the correct ticker. Enjoy 😉
authors: The authors of this bot are: Alexey Horbunov (@Alexey_Horbunov) GitHub: Click on this link LinkedIn: Click on this link Timofey Fedorchuk (@tim_fedor) GitHub: Click on this link LinkedIn: Click on this link
